thread.title: To turn India cashless, Narendra Modi govt set to roll-out NITI Aayog-powered cashback scheme
thread.title_full: To turn India cashless, Narendra Modi govt set to roll-out NITI Aayog-powered cashback scheme

author: FE Online
title: To turn India cashless, Narendra Modi govt set to roll-out NITI Aayog-powered cashback scheme
text:
To turn India cashless, Narendra Modi govt set to roll-out NITI Aayog-powered cashback scheme To turn India cashless, Narendra Modi govt set to roll-out NITI Aayog-powered cashback scheme Amitabh Kant, the Chief Executive Officer (CEO) of National Institution for Transforming India (NITI) Aayog is all set to promote digital payments through cashback schemes. By: FE Online | New Delhi | Published: February 21, 2017 12:59 PM CEO of NITI Aayog, Amitabh Kant. 
Amitabh Kant, the Chief Executive Officer (CEO) of National Institution for Transforming India (NITI) Aayog is all set to promote digital payments through cashback schemes. In an interview with media Kant said, “NITI Ayog will come up with Cash back scheme to encourage digital payment.” In order to promote cashless transactions, NITI aayog will reward money in the cash back scheme. He said, “Nearly 10 lakh citizens get reward money over Rs 153.5 cr for embracing Digital Payments. Among the 9.8 lakh winners, more than 9.2 lakh are consumers and 56000 are merchants.120 consumers have won prize money worth Rs1 lakh each.” 
Further details awaited.
